pages.title: Thermal Series
pages.text: The Thermal Series is a set of mods that adds machines, tools, the processing of resources and the generation and storage of energy in the form of Redstone Flux. Basic machines can be upgraded to 4 higher tiers, each adding features and functionality and can be further improved with Augments for added configuration and efficiency.

pages.title: The Modules
pages.text: $(l)- Thermal Foundation$()$(br)The Core tools & materials$(br)$(l:https://teamcofh.com/docs/1.12/thermal-foundation/)Documentation$(/l)$(br2)$(l)- Thermal Expansion$()$(br)Processing, energy & storage$(br)$(l:https://teamcofh.com/docs/1.12/thermal-expansion/)Documentation$(/l)$(br2)$(l)- Thermal Dynamics$()$(br)Energy & material Transport$(br)$(l:https://teamcofh.com/docs/1.12/thermal-dynamics/)Documentation$(/l)$(br2)$(l)- Thermal Innovation$()$(br)Gadgets & tools$(br)$(l:https://teamcofh.com/docs/1.12/thermal-innovation/)Documentation$(/l)
